explains: adj. 变形的，扭曲的；（观点，想法）受到曲解的；（声音）失真的
v. 使变形，使变样；歪曲，曲解；使（电信号，声波）畸变，使失真（distort 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: distorted wave 畸形波；失真波

sentences.en: The article gave a distorted picture of his childhood.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章对他的童年作了歪曲的描述。

sentences.en: Sound was becoming more and more distorted through the use of hearing aids.
sentences.cn: 由于使用助听器，声音变得越来越失真。

sentences.en: For example, those bright, distorted figures.
sentences.cn: 例如，那些明亮而扭曲的形象。
